name: Sniper Mission - An Assassin Shooting Game
name_original: Sniper Mission - An Assassin Shooting Game
description:
An addicting and challenging sniper game!

As an assassin,show your sniper shooting skills with your sniper rifle.
In this tactical sniper game,your boss has given various sniper missions to clean the bad mans.
Action Now!Read the briefings carefully,identify your targets and shoot them with accuracy.

Good Luck!
